banner.title: Welcome to TimeMaster Pro
banner.description: Optimize your time and achieve a better work-life balance with our AI-powered time management tool.

features.title: Task Planning and Scheduling
features.description: Plan and organize your tasks with ease. Set due dates, prioritize, and tag tasks for an organized lifestyle.

features.title: AI-Based Task Recommendations
features.description: Get smart task recommendations to help you prioritize and manage tasks efficiently.

features.title: Time Tracking
features.description: Track the time you spend on different tasks and optimize your productivity.

features.title: Focus Mode
features.description: Utilize our distraction-free mode with customizable focus sessions to keep you on track.

steps.title: Step 1: Register
steps.description: Sign up for an account to get started with TimeMaster Pro.

steps.title: Step 2: Plan Your Tasks
steps.description: Input your tasks and organize them based on due dates, priorities, and tags.

steps.title: Step 3: Utilize AI Recommendations
steps.description: Let our AI help you prioritize your tasks and create an efficient schedule.

steps.title: Step 4: Track and Analyze
steps.description: Use the time tracking and analytics tools to optimize your workflow and productivity.

plans.name: Basic
plans.description: Perfect for personal use. Get access to basic features.

plans.name: Pro
plans.description: Ideal for professionals. Includes advanced features and integrations.

plans.name: Enterprise
plans.description: For teams and organizations. Includes collaboration and analytics.

questions.question: What is TimeMaster Pro?
questions.answer: TimeMaster Pro is an AI-driven time management tool designed to help you optimize your productivity and achieve a healthier work-life balance.

questions.question: How do I sign up?
questions.answer: Click on the 'Get Started' button and follow the registration steps to create your account.

questions.question: Is there a free trial?
questions.answer: Yes, TimeMaster Pro offers a 14-day free trial for new users. No credit card required.

questions.question: Can I collaborate with others?
questions.answer: Yes, the Pro and Enterprise plans include collaboration tools that allow you to share tasks and schedules with your team.

readyToGetStarted.title: Ready to Get Started?
readyToGetStarted.description: Join TimeMaster Pro today and transform the way you manage your time.
